title: Authentic Chicken Cacciatore
description: A hunter-style stew with deep tomato flavors and wine. Heart healthy with veggies.
ingredients: 1 (28 oz) can Whole Peeled Tomatoes, crushed by hand
instructions: Sear Chicken: Pat chicken dry, season with salt/pepper. Sear in oil until golden brown. Remove.
Sauté Veggies: Cook onion, carrots, celery until softened. Add garlic.
Simmer: Add tomatoes, oregano, rosemary. Return chicken. Cover and simmer low 30-40 mins.
Finish: Uncover, simmer 5-10 mins to thicken. Season and serve.

title: Cod Pizzaiola (Baccalà Style)
description: Flaky cod baked in a zesty, pizza-inspired tomato sauce. High Omega-3s.
instructions: Make Sauce: Sauté garlic in oven-safe skillet. Add tomatoes, capers, oregano, pepper flakes. Simmer 10-15 mins.
Bake: Nestle cod into sauce. Bake 12-15 mins until flaky.
Serve: Garnish with basil or parsley.

title: Ultimate Smoky Pasta e Fagioli
description: A rich, stew-like version built on smoked meat and a deep tomato base.
ingredients: 1 (28 oz) can Whole Peeled Tomatoes, hand-crushed
instructions: Sauté Base: Add onion, carrots, celery to fat. Cook until soft.
Deepen: Add whole garlic, pepper flakes, tomato paste. Fry paste 2 mins.
Simmer: Add tomatoes, broth, rosemary, parmesan rind. Simmer 20-30 mins.
Finish: Add ditalini and beans. Cook until pasta is al dente (10 mins). Season with splash of balsamic.
